column1: After Michelle Steel was spotted yesterday at a COVID-19 superspreader fundraiser collecting campaign checks her campaign has been sharing photos of my wife and I eating dinner without face masks...from January...  Orange County's most corrupt politician continues to be corrupt. https://t.co/ibZp8XOQZh

.@MichelleSteelCA is a lot like @RealDonaldTrump. They both:   💵 Lie about their opponent's finances 🦠 Led disastrous COVID-19 responses 💰 Use taxpayer dollars to campaign  🤯 Condone QAnon conspiracy theories

Hey @MichelleSteelCA are you attending President Trump's COVID-19 superspreader fundraiser? Will you condemn the President's irresponsible in-person event costing taxpayers and threatening OC's health?   Or will you continue to stay silent and refuse to put #CountryOverParty?

President Trump is headlining a COVID-19 superspreader fundraiser TODAY in Orange County.  Can you chip in to help us push back against @RealDonaldTrump and his spreading of hate and COVID-19? https://t.co/de0krApxX7

Tomorrow during a pandemic @RealDonaldTrump is headlining an in-person campaign fundraising event in OUR community.  As #CA48's Congressman let me say this — Orange County doesn't want your COVID-19 superspreader event. Go back to your swamp @RealDonaldTrump.

Let's talk about keeping Orange County safe.   Michelle Steel's failed #COVID19 response forced small businesses to shutter and cost our community lives. She's focused more on protecting pets than the people of Orange County. https://t.co/qAxHZArEEE https://t.co/cqePpNadjU

I'm pissed off and you should be too.   The President of the United States is preventing Orange County families from getting critical emergency relief to put food on the table and survive #COVID19.  Will Trump loyalists like @MichelleSteelCA finally stand up to @RealDonaldTrump? https://t.co/A2IkqFIDHa

Almost 210000 Americans have lost their lives to #COVID19. Our President’s advice? “Don’t be afraid.”  Mr. President — Americans would be a lot less afraid if we had access to the kind of testing tracing and treatment you got. https://t.co/F7P5c5mo8S
I'm sending strength to the President First Lady and millions of Americans battling a #COVID19 diagnosis. We MUST do everything we can to stop this national nightmare.
*Photos were taken before #COVID19

We must listen to experts and make decisions based on science to protect lives & livelihoods.   My opponent who leads OC's #COVID19 response takes medical advice from a man who thinks GUNS fight #COVID19 better than masks. https://t.co/z3kTHQLvqR

My opponent's Emergency Medical Commissioner claimed a gun provides more protection against #COVID19 than a mask.  Michelle Steel's silence is a slap in the face to OC families who have lost loved ones to #COVID19 or gun violence. https://t.co/4aj74KDrAM

Normally my team & volunteers would be knocking on doors and talking to Orange County neighbors about my record and what's at stake this November.  I need your help to safely reach voters during #COVID19. Can you join me this weekend to make calls? https://t.co/oE9IDBsh93

Not only does my opponent refuse to put county over party and condemn Trump — she used his playbook to fail OC.   @MichelleSteelCA downplayed our #COVID19 crisis reversed a mask order and sat idly by as top public health officials were pushed out. https://t.co/dW84clUPr1

Are you looking to channel your frustration about President Trump's handling of #COVID19 into action? Do you want to help elect common sense candidates? Join my team to make calls and virtually volunteer 👇👇 https://t.co/AlZrgFLXrE
President Trump KNEW how deadly the coronavirus was in FEBRUARY.   President Trump admitted he “played down” the threat.   I’m absolutely sickened. https://t.co/2dv5m7ynmz

What hurt our economy is your complete and total failure as our President. Under your “leadership” America has:  No national testing strategy. No national mask mandate. No plan to beat #COVID19.  Stop making the pandemic political. https://t.co/BPA4ldO0mp
Imagine if male Republican Senators cared about the coronavirus as much as they care about legislating women’s bodies. https://t.co/VSoa1uZHed

Tonight I will grieve for 1000 lives lost and hold my family close. Tomorrow I'll continue my fight to protect Orange County small businesses and working families until every last trace of COVID-19 is gone. (4/4)

THREAD: Today is a somber day — we have officially lost 1000 of our Orange County neighbors friends and family members to the coronavirus.  It did not have to be this way and I won't forget the officials who silenced science and kicked common-sense to the curb. (1/x)

A reminder that @JoeBiden didn't mention @realDonaldTrump's name ONCE in his #DNC2020 speech.   @JoeBiden spoke about his plans to contain #COVID19 build our economy back better address racial injustice and "draw on the best of us not the worst."  As a real leader should... https://t.co/DpoHlroIRe
Not only do we still not have a national #COVID19 testing strategy but @RealDonaldTrump's Administration is pressuring the CDC to recommend LESS testing. https://t.co/zHhp2A0GsK
Calling #COVID19 the “China Virus” is racist. Full stop.

Is the @USPS under attack? Yes.  Is California on fire? Yes. Are hundreds of Americans dying every single day from #COVID19? Yes.  Does @realDonaldTrump have a plan to address any of these crises? No.

As the U.S. #COVID19 death count nears 165000 the 24/7 tragedy can be numbing. However we must remain vigilant in our fight against the coronavirus.   Please wear your mask and practice social distancing to protect lives and livelihoods.

The coronavirus crisis has made it clear — good government matters. I'm proud to support @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris in their fight to listen to public health experts root out government corruption and create policies that put American small businesses and working families first.

Quote this tweet: What is keeping you and your family up at night during the coronavirus crisis? What assistance does your small business need? What do you want to see @SenateGOP include in their “deal”?

It’s been 84 days since the House passed an emergency #COVID19 relief package.   Families can't wait another day. Workers can't wait another day. Small businesses can’t wait another day.  RT if you can't wait another day for the @SenateGOP to do their damn jobs.

Good morning @MichelleSteelCA.  The subtweeting is getting old — thought I’d re-up my debate invitation.   I’m proud of my record to secure #COVID19 funding for OC promote science and help small businesses. Are you proud of yours? https://t.co/nsuc4zs7uu

On June 11th @MichelleSteelCA said OC is “well on its way to getting out of this situation."   Today 32 people died.  She pushed out health officials.  She reversed a mask order.  She falsely underreported our #COVID19 case rates for weeks.  Her failure is bigger than politics. https://t.co/96rE8YEnAz

32 neighbors family members and friends.  32 lives and livelihoods.  32 futures.   All gone — in a single day.   How leaders respond to the coronavirus crisis is a matter of life & death. @MichelleSteelCA has failed to protect us. https://t.co/4Ys40sq5gQ

Michelle Steel and Pres. Trump said #COVID19 would "disappear." The only thing that's disappeared is their leadership.  Instead of protecting OC families & businesses Steel misrepresented the coronavirus crisis.   RT to share Steel's failed leadership. https://t.co/XddMzvCXlk

Yesterday the U.S. Senate adjourned for a long weekend — without reaching a deal on a LONG overdue emergency #COVID19 package.   @senatemajldr Mitch McConnell is twiddling his thumbs while Rome burns and Americans die.  Working families & small businesses deserve better. https://t.co/QoVVcF7CPd
#COVID19 has killed 140000+ Americans. https://t.co/LW0Ra2mDB1

President Trump's latest xenophobic attack is despicable. South Koreans are not "terrible people" for successfully combating #COVID19. Instead of attacking our ally @RealDonaldTrump should learn from South Korea to finally make this virus "disappear.” https://t.co/ATmxUQK6CH

In the middle of a global pandemic @senatemajldr Mitch McConnell has left an emergency #COVID19 bill on his desk for OVER TWO MONTHS. What a middle-finger to working families & small businesses across the United States.   I'm sick of his callous inaction aren't you?

I have 4 grown children and can't imagine how difficult #COVID19 has been on parents with school-aged children. Parents teachers children and our communities deserve answers to the questions below — not radical no-mask/no-social distancing proposals. https://t.co/CeKKkvhSMC

I don't support defunding public safety. Some questions you've refused to answer:   - When did you know OC was erroneously inflating #COVID19 testing numbers? - How involved were you in your business partner's financial dealings with the CCP? - Why do you refuse to wear a mask? https://t.co/6AGSJGjScq https://t.co/lRcg3wPv0B

Four weeks ago Chairwoman @MichelleSteelCA (who leads OC’s response to #COVID19) said “Orange County is well on its way to getting out of this situation.”  In her absence of leadership — please #WearAMask to protect public health and help our economy. https://t.co/h89WkEOVaE

26 deaths...today...in Orange County.   26 neighbors grandparents friends children coworkers and family.   #COVID19 is out of control in Orange County. I’ll keep fighting to hold County leadership accountable for ignoring and silencing science.  Please wear your mask. https://t.co/13zZl7P2CH

My bipartisan bill would give small business owners a tax credit to purchase #PPE and other supplies essential to mitigating the spread of #COVID19. Small businesses are struggling — they shouldn’t be responsible for costs to provide safe & clean service. https://t.co/VlnS3Pnpva

The Orange County Board of Supervisors chaired by @MichelleSteelCA sat idly by as their #COVID19 data was falsely inflated (to the tune of 30000 tests) for OVER A MONTH.   This isn't a "mistake" — it's malpractice.  https://t.co/YuhBAtpEp9

Throughout the coronavirus crisis Chairwoman @MichelleSteelCA has deliberately misled our community.  Numbers don't lie -- hospitalizations ICU admittance and deaths are spiking. Her lies and lack of leadership are putting OC lives on the line. https://t.co/ayp62sB47K

Small businesses are struggling — they shouldn't have to foot the bill to provide safe & clean service. My bipartisan bill would give small business owners a tax credit to purchase #PPE and other supplies essential to mitigating the spread of #COVID19. https://t.co/Tkyvd5lO0V

Today OC reported a record number of #COVID19 cases.  The OC Board of Supervisors chaired by @MichelleSteelCA failed to hold a press conference last week. There’s no press conference/meeting scheduled this week. Nothing planned for next week.  Where is County leadership? https://t.co/4jAZXV70zG

Read this and reaffirm your commitment to:   - Wear a mask - Practice social distancing - Wash your hands  We’re all in this together — we must do everything we can to protect our neighbors friends and family from #COVID19. https://t.co/95lazP6qDi

My opponent is tasked with leading Orange County through the #COVID19 outbreak. Last week our county became a national laughing stock as she rolled back our mask order.   Why did she defy science and basic economics?   WATCH ⬇️ then contribute to stop her https://t.co/SGOpaeHgnn https://t.co/vqp9zsdzEq
THREAD: During the coronavirus crisis there has been a spike in Nazi imagery and white supremacist language across Orange County. It is inexcusable. (1/x)

My opponent who is supposed to oversee Orange County’s local #COVID19 response asked TODAY if asymptomatic people can pass #COVID19 to others...  Orange County deserves leaders who listen to scientists not @realDonaldTrump. https://t.co/FfpdP0ypKw

(1/4) Supervisors Bartlett and Do's HEART Plan is a pragmatic proposal that puts Orange County's working families and small businesses first. During the coronavirus crisis I've been proud to secure $554 million in federal funding to help our local economy and communities recover

As we navigate the #COVID19 crisis the people of coastal OC deserve clear concise and comprehensive plans that balance the protection of their physical mental and economic health.   Read my full statement on Gov. Newsom's order to close OC beaches: https://t.co/xwikaIQmoF

With so many at home due to #COVID19 there’s been an increase of domestic violence.   If you or someone you know are experiencing domestic or sexual violence @RAINN is here to help 24/7.   Call 1-800-656-4673 or visit https://t.co/VBvDeeYC9C. #SAAM

The 50th anniversary of #EarthDay feels a bit different indoors. Sadly the EPA is using #COVID19 as an excuse to stop enforcing environmental protections.  I'm calling on @realDonaldTrump to reenforce these protections & protect the earth for our children. https://t.co/dZjZzvCJ6n

These protesters are putting thousands of Orange County residents unnecessarily at risk. #COVID19 is a deadly disease often spread by symptomless carriers. Stay home. Save lives.  https://t.co/TJfpMBxmws

This morning's jobs report is a jarring reminder that the #COVID19 crisis goes beyond our immediate health and wellness.  If you've lost income due to #COVID19 you may be eligible for expanded unemployment benefits.   CA - file unemployment claims here: https://t.co/sbRKMSyRss https://t.co/FjSSxb510S

Property taxes are due in one week. My opponent who has the power to relieve #COVID19 impacted families of this burden hasn’t done so.   I sent her a letter asking to work together so we can pause federal state AND local taxes. https://t.co/44nwkcVMCB

Nonprofits across OC are doing everything they can to lessen the blow of #COVID19. @SecondHarvestFB estimates they need $340k/week to keep up with increased demand.  Click below to send money directly to local nonprofits as they help combat this outbreak: https://t.co/laiiuk1Q2W https://t.co/uauS58nUHj

.@CDCGov is calling for our health care providers to use "homemade masks (e.g. bandana scarf)" to fight #COVID19...in the wealthiest country in the history of the world.   This Administration's denial of science and poor planning is putting lives at risk.

My heart aches for Roddy and his family. We need to get him and millions of Americans #COVID19 tests immediately. The lack of preparation and shoddy execution of public health protocol by this administration has cost Americans their loved ones. https://t.co/kjhIK7F3nh
Calling #COVID19 the “Chinese Virus” puts our AAPI community in danger. This racist rhetoric has no place in our country. https://t.co/W8ntM1RU8F

OC had our first locally acquired case of #COVID19 but luckily the risk of community spread remains low. Our community’s most vulnerable rely on all of us to take public distancing seriously and we must do everything we can to #FlattenTheCurve.   For questions call: (800)564-8448 https://t.co/UlJZVcWL1m

The House is doing everything it can to stop the spread of #COVID19 and help working families. President Trump declared a national emergency and will sign the #FamiliesFirst #Coronavirus Response Act.  Lives are depending on @senatemajldr to get back from his weekender.

This crisis isn’t about wealthy corporations it’s about protecting everyday people. At 1 AM I voted for the #FamiliesFirstBill to guarantee free #COVIDー19 testing paid emergency leave and food security for the American people.  Meanwhile @senatemajldr took a weekend vacation

The United States is WOEFULLY under testing for #COVID19.  I thank the President for his long-overdue national emergency declaration but respectfully we need to see more than blown-up flow charts concerning testing. https://t.co/2cYVV6fIFe

.@GOPLeader and @realDonaldTrump are refusing to consider a bill that has: ✅ Free Coronavirus Testing ✅ Paid Emergency Medical Leave ✅ Food Assistance ✅ Help for Healthcare Workers  Demand they put our country’s safety ahead of their corporate donors’ interests. https://t.co/7IMLnR1Usa

We are watching @RealDonaldTrump’s political playbook unfold in real-time:   1) Call something a hoax  2) Limit access to information  3) Call “the media” liars  4) Rinse & repeat   #COVID19 is a public health crisis — we need leadership not partisan games. https://t.co/b9BsowkBoI

#COVID19 is a serious public health issue that demands a strategic comprehensive and science-based plan of attack — not political grandstanding from the Oval Office.   American families deserve more from our Commander in Chief. https://t.co/uoHKmP6A63

Costa Mesa's Fairview Developmental Center sits next to schools homes and businesses — it's not suitable for housing #COVID19 patients. I've asked @HHSGov to provide answers: Why here? Why now? How was this site selected? https://t.co/ZsRGRTfuQS

Yesterday I joined my colleagues to demand answers from both state and federal health officials regarding their plans to move coronavirus patients into Costa Mesa. This breakdown in communication must end so we can come to a safe and compassionate solution https://t.co/YcPNlvWKvi https://t.co/jrjeOYwi74
